bundle.name: mysql

description.p: This bundle installs the MySQL database onto your machine.

field.name: password
field.label: MySQL root password
field.description: Enter 'root' password for the mysql server.

bundle.preinst: debconf-set-selections <<< \ 'mysql-server mysql-server/root_password password ${BUNDLE_INSTALLATION_PASSWORD}' debconf-set-selections <<< \ 'mysql-server mysql-server/root_password_again password ${BUNDLE_INSTALLATION_PASSWORD}'
